member.name: T:PlanningAgent.PlanningAgent
member.summary: Planning Agent is the over-head planner that decided where individual units go and what tasks they perform. Low-level AI is handled by other classes (like pathfinding).

member.name: M:PlanningAgent.PlanningAgent.InitializeMatch
member.summary: Called before each match between two agents. Matches have multiple rounds.

member.name: M:PlanningAgent.PlanningAgent.InitializeRound(AgentSDK.IGameState)
member.summary: Called at the beginning of each round in a match.

member.name: M:PlanningAgent.PlanningAgent.Update(AgentSDK.IGameState,AgentSDK.IAgentActions)
member.summary: Update the GameManager - called once per frame

member.name: M:PlanningAgent.PlanningAgent.FindClosestUnits(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32},AgentSDK.IGameState)
member.summary: Find closest enemy units sorted by distance to main base Returns dictionary of unitNbr -> distance
